list: Kool Aid or other powdered drink

movie.title: Jonestown: The Life and Death of Peoples Temple
movie.plot: Featuring never-before-seen footage, this documentary delivers a startling new look at the Peoples Temple, headed by preacher Jim Jones who, in 1978, led more than 900 members to Guyana, where he orchestrated a mass suicide via tainted punch.

list: Kool Aid or other powdered drink

movie.title: Jonestown: Paradise Lost
movie.plot: Cult leader Jim Jones leads his followers to a mass-suicide.
